annotations.kubernetes.io/description: Contains a CA bundle that can be used to verify the kube-apiserver when using internal endpoints such as the internal service IP or kubernetes.default.svc. No other usage is guaranteed across distributions of Kubernetes clusters.

conditions.message: PodDisruptionBudget for test-cluster-pxc: reconcile pdb: PodDisruptionBudget.policy "test-cluster-pxc" is invalid: spec: Invalid value: policy.PodDisruptionBudgetSpec{MinAvailable:(*intstr.IntOrString)(0xc004c0c020), Selector:(*v1.LabelSelector)(0xc004c0c040), MaxUnavailable:(*intstr.IntOrString)(0xc004c0c080)}: minAvailable and maxUnavailable cannot be both set
